title: Andhra HC asks state to develop Amaravati as capital on lines proposed by previous govt - The Indian Express
content:
1. Andhra HC asks state to develop Amaravati as capital on lines proposed by previous govt  The Indian Express
  2. 3 capitals row: Andhra Pradesh HC orders govt to develop Amaravati within 6 months  Deccan Chronicle
  3. HC orders Andhra govt to develop Amaravati as capital  Moneycontrol
  4. Amaravati is Andhraâ€™s capital, govt has no right to enact law for 3 capitals: HC  Hindustan Times
  5. Will respond after receiving AP High Court judgment copy on three capital, says Botsa Satyanarayana  The Hans India
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The High Court, while passing its judgment over a clutch of petitions filed by farmers who had given up their land for the development of the capital city, said that the state government should develop the plots and give them back in the next three months.
